text: Santa Rita is a district of the Nandayure canton, in the Guanacaste province of Costa Rica. == Geography == Santa Rita has an area of km² and an elevation of metres. ==Villages== Administrative center of the district is the village of Santa Rita. Other villages in the district are Angostura, Cacao, Chumico, Guaria, Guastomatal, Morote, Tacanis, Uvita (partly), Hierbabuena (partly). == Demographics == For the 2011 census, Santa Rita had a population of inhabitants. == Transportation == === Road transportation === The district is covered by the following road routes: *25px National Route 21 *25px National Route 161 == References == Category:Districts of Guanacaste Province Category:Populated places in Guanacaste Province
title: Santa Rita District, Nandayure
